## Project-Specific Cost of Capital ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(404) #| eval: true #| results: asis #| echo: false #| warning: false library(webexercises) rf <- 0.03 beta_project <- rnorm(1, mean = 1.2, sd = 0.1) rm <- 0.09 ``` ::: Aurora Technologies is evaluating a project with beta **1.28**. Assume the risk-free rate is **3**% and the expected market return is **9**%. ::: {.question-block}
✅ Cost of equity (CAPM for project) = r_f + β_project (r_m − r_f) = **10.66**%.
:::
